ygData.subject: Re: How? Where?
ygData.msgSnippet: The orges (or what ever they are) sells the blacksmith books and some molds too, their are 2 of them standing side by side I am not sure if they sell anything
ygData.messageBody:
The orges (or what ever they are) sells the blacksmith books and some molds
too, their are 2 of them standing side by side I am not sure if they sell
anything different (didn't really care at the time), I thought I saw skewers
in their someplace, it has been a while since I was their, so forgive me if
I am wrong. I do know they don't sell the ore, only the books and some
molds, if it is any help.

Tenin - 7th lvl - Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: King, Darrin <dking@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 3:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] How? Where?


From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>

*My smith is a Dark Elf, and I was wondering about smithing as
*a Dark Elf.


I know that ore is sold in Neriak. Go downstairs in the Blind Fish tavern;
the two dart players sell ore and I think molds, not sure.
